title: Norma Project - Morning Light (2014)
description:
Psytrance / Progressive Trance

Tracklist:
01. Norma Project - Forest People
02. Norma Project - In The Morning
03. Norma Project - Spring Time
04. Norma Project - Sunlight
05. Norma Project - Digital Earth
06. Norma Project - Butterflies
07. Norma Project - Mystic Source Of Melodies
08. Norma Project - Moon's Door
09. Norma Project - Elves Flute
10. Norma Project & Argus - Elenya

About:
After his many fresh hit releases on digital EP's and singles, his sound is already well heard and followed by an active group of fans worldwide.
Norma's music is focused on progressive deep groovy basslines, mystic wide atmospheres, gentle liquid melodies and psychedelic effects. This ten song story called Morning Light brings out the best of his ideas after being polished and perfected for amazing moments of bliss on world wide trance floors and beyond.

From his early years he had an interest in music and learned how to play guitar when very young and he became a professional musician and played in a Rock and blues band all around the world! He experimented in many genres of music, and after 40 years in the music industry, Gradimir found himself writing psychedelic trance and ambient music along with his two suns Bojan and Branko who are making they own top charting productions as Ascent and Argus the later of whom joins his father for track 10, a soft chill close to the album.

Ovnimoon Records presents this amazing debut artist album from one of the fastest rising stars...

... coming out of Serbia in the recent years, Norma Project is a Progressive Psytrance act founded by Gradimir Stojiljkovic in Krushevac.

Style: Progressive Trance
Released: Oct. 2014
Format: CD
Cat-No: OVN1CD095
